section.title: Reorder Exceptions by Planner Code
section.para: A reorder exception is an indication that an item site's projected availability will drop below the reorder level for that item site. To view a list of items requiring orders to correct projected deficits, go to Schedule > Reports > Reorder Exceptions. The following screen will appear:
When displaying reorder exceptions by planner code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display reorder expedite exceptions for all planner codes.
Specify planner code whose reorder expedite exceptions you want to display.
Enter a planner code pattern to select a range of planner codes. Refine your search using regular expressions.
Select to display reorder expedite exceptions by planner code for all sites.
Specify site whose reorder expedite exceptions by planner code you want to display.
Select a number using the arrows, or manually enter a value up to a maximum of 1000. Reorder expedite exceptions by planner code will be displayed based on the value entered here.
Select to include planned orders in the display.
Display lists reorder expedite exceptions by planner code, using the specified parameters.
